item.name: Knife
item.description: A sturdy knife which can be equipped.

item.name: Tome of Akanog
item.description: A beautiful tome. Gold writing on the cover reads "Tome of Akanog". The book describes the teachings of the First Enchanter Akanog, long lost to the world when the Enchanter Guild that he founded was attacked by the Lunar Knights who burned their tower, including the library to the ground.

item.name: Butcher Knife
item.description: A large butcher knife which can be equipped.

item.name: Big Ruby
item.description: A large ruby that sparkles at the touch of light.
